title: Turkey Sanctions Lifted After Cease-Fire
itunes:title: Turkey Sanctions Lifted After Cease-Fire
description:
Jonathan Schanzer, Senior Vice President for Research at the Foundation for Defense of Democracies discusses President Trump’s announcement that he is lifting recently imposed sanctions against Turkey after the country complied with a cease-fire agreement with Kurdish forces in Syria. He speaks to Bloomberg’s Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
